A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Version Number**
The version number and build are listed at the bottom of every page in grey text in the following format `S.L.U.G.S. version: vX.X.X - b.XX.XX.XX.XX.XX.XXUTC`

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
